price: i govore: “Nećemo ti vjerovati sve dok nam iz zemlje izvorsku vodu ne izvedeš,
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā mina al-arḍi yanbūʿan
